Text:
Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood Patch 1.02 - Changelog


Fixed 

Single + Multiplayer

- Fixes an issue that prevents user settings and game progress from being saved if the user's Windows login name contains unicode characters.
- Fixes an issue where users could not add friends whose name contains dot characters.

Multiplayer

- Changed network communication port from 1000 to 7917 in order to fix connection issues caused some ISPs' restrictions.
but this is not a multiplayer cracked update?
Can i play multiplayer now on this one?
why update? what's the purpose if multiplayer is not cracked?

When I try to Run acbrotherhood1.02update.exe
I get an error "Could not retrieve installation folder! Installation will be aborted."

I have the same problem too.everytime I play the game for about 6 to 8 minutes, the game chrashes and breaks and freezes my pc,and i need to restart my computer. pls help , i dont know know why it keeps happenning,i tried everything lowering the graphics,updating the game,reinstalling it, disabling antivirus ,firewall, disabling startup programs even services in msconfig, my specs are fine ,even better than the recommended for playing Assassin's creed brotherhood according to system rating.my graphic card is a GTS 250 gigabyte lgb,my processor is an intel core2duo 2.80GHZ running on windows 7 32-bit.pls help ,i would really appreciate it.
the game is 90% working.. only the multiplayer is the problem... check the system requirements guys... maybe your PC is the problem...it requires dual core and a good graphic card..
